articles.author: Seb Starcevic
articles.title: Danish PM to Greenlanders: ‘You have not been cowed’ by Trump - POLITICO
articles.description: On the eve of a visit from JD Vance and other American officials, Denmark's PM cautions Greenlanders that President Donald Trump's interest in Greenland "is not going away."
articles.content: Greenland, an autonomous territory within the Kingdom of Denmark, is home to roughly 56,000 people who are Danish citizens. Trumps repeated and at times aggressive remarks about acquiring the island,… [+1756 chars]

articles.author: Joe Rao
articles.title: What will happen during the partial solar eclipse of March 2025? - Space.com
articles.description: Observers across eastern North America and much of Europe will have front-row seats to the striking partial solar eclipse on March 29. Here's what to expect.
articles.content:
What a difference a year makes!
Just a year ago, countless millions across North America were anxiously awaiting the "great North American total eclipse of the sun"
 on April 8. Now, less than a ye… [+9577 chars]
